Uses of Interface
logic.Updatable

  • Packages that use Updatable 
    Package Description
    guis  
    logic  

    • Uses of Updatable in guis

      Classes in guis that implement Updatable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Draw
      Classes which inherit this class can draw on a MyCanvas.
      class  EditorCanvasDraw
      This canvas makes up the editable map portion of the editor frame.
      class  EditorChaliceDraw
      This functions as a brush which edits the game map.
      class  EditorEmptyTileDraw
      Draws "empty tiles" on the canvas.
      class  EditorEnemySpawnerDraw
      Draws "enemy spawners" on the canvas.
      class  EditorGroundTileDraw
      Draws "ground tiles" on the canvas.
      class  EditorPlayerSpawnDraw
      Draws "player spawns" on the canvas.
      class  GameCanvas
      This is the canvas to display the game elements and state of the game.
      class  GameCanvasDraw 

    • Uses of Updatable in logic

      Classes in logic that implement Updatable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Actor
      An actor is a thing which can act and "is" on the game map.
      class  Camera
      The camera follows a target.
      class  Chalice
      The Chalice is the object, which the player has to get to.
      class  EmptyTile
      The empty tile is like "air".
      class  Enemy
      An enemies goal is to kill the player.
      class  EnemySpawner
      Spawns an enemy periodically at its position.
      class  Entity
      An entity has health management and damage.
      class  GameMap
      The game's map is a field where Actors can interact and a grid, on which the entities can move.
      class  GroundTile
      The ground prevents the entities to infinitely fall, giving them a solid ground to walk on.
      class  Movable
      A class which extend the Movable class, will have a velocity vector attached to it.
      class  PistolBullet
      A player shot bullet which damages enemies if it hit them, cannot penetrate walls (gets destroyed by them).
      class  Player
      The player is controlled by the user.
      class  PlayerSpawn
      The player spawn on a game map defines where the player spawns on the start of the game.
      class  Tile 
      Fields in logic with type parameters of type Updatable 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Updatable> GameClock.updatables
      The elements which needs to be updated.
      Methods in logic with parameters of type Updatable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GameClock.addUpdatable(Updatable u)
      Adds an updatable to the updatables array.
      void GameClock.removeUpdatable(Updatable u)
      Removes an updatable from the updatables array.
